title: Effect of drug on cell cycle

content.question: The drug <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>-fluorouracil inhibits thymine production in eukaryotic cells. Which of the following cell cycle stages will be most directly affected by <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>-fluorouracil?

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
